extLineItemId.description: A unique identifier for your Line Item

title.description: A Line Item title of your choosing

surveyURL.description: Survey URL to send panelist into.

surveyTestURL.description: Survey Test URL. Required for survey verification

indicativeIncidence.description: Percent of panelists you expect to qualify for the survey after they go in

daysInField.description: Number of days the survey should be active in the field. We do not stop the survey after daysInField has expired

lengthOfInterview.description: Average number of minutes it takes a user to complete your survey

deliveryType.description: The plan on how responses will flow into the survey.

sources.description: The supplier source that you would like to buy sample from. You can get the list of sources available to your account using the [Get List of Sources](/demand-api-reference/data_endpoints/supplier-sources/get-sources) endpoint

targets.description: Total count of survey completes required for this line item

count.description: Total number of counts required for this line item for the specified target type

dailyLimit.description: Total number of daily counts required for this line item

type.description: The type of counts required for this line item.

quotaPlan.title: Quota Plan
quotaPlan.description: Defines the type of respondents you want to invite for the survey

filters.description: Filters are minimum set of targeting that every respondent must have in order to qualify for the study. Only attributes that have `isAllowedInFilters = true` is allowed to be used in `filters`

attributeId.description: The attribute you want to target respondents on

options.description: The options of the attribute you want to target respondents on

operator.description: The operator to use for the attribute options.

quotaGroups.description: Quota groups define the allocated targeting attributes for panelists within this line item. Only attributes that have `isAllowedInQuotas = true` is allowed in `quotaGroups`.

name.description: A quota group name of your choosing

quotaCells.description: Quota Cells define the percentage allocation for the required targeting. A quota cell is made up of a collection of quota Nodes

quotaNodes.description: Quota Nodes define the collection of attributes and options being targeted.

attributeId.description: The attribute you want to target respondents on

options.description: The options of the attribute you want to target respondents on

operator.description: **Deprecated field** The operator to use for the attribute options.

count.description: The count of respondents you want to qualify for the defined quota cell
